name: Lusk
description:
"Lusk (verb) - To lounge around." The slowest platformer puzzle game ever.

A desserted house... time to get some fresh air. Even if it takes a few years. Glide, crawl, search the walls, and discover all secret endings!

Team - FROG the JAM

Hugo Morencé: Programmer, Designer, 2D Art

Junferno: Programmer, 2D/3D Art, Music/Sound

Vincent St-Pierre: Programmer
